org.gradle.language.base.sources

Class BaseLanguageSourceSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractBuildableModelElement
      • org.gradle.language.base.sources.BaseLanguageSourceSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, BuildableModelElement, Named, org.gradle.language.base.internal.LanguageSourceSetInternal, LanguageSourceSet

    @Incubating
public class BaseLanguageSourceSet
extends org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractBuildableModelElement
implements org.gradle.language.base.internal.LanguageSourceSetInternal
    Base class for custom language sourceset implementations. A custom implementation of LanguageSourceSet must extend this type.
